DataElement.preferredName: Patient Pre-Therapy Baseline Audiogram Improvement Finding Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The result of improved, worsened, or no response to hearing change detected from baseline audiogram/evaluation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Occurring before therapy._A starting point to which things may be compared._A graphic record of the softest sounds that a person can hear at various frequencies, used to measure hearing loss._A condition superior to an earlier condition.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.
